item.title: Nintendo ‘Close to You’ animated video updated with Pikmin
item.content:encoded:
• Nintendo

Moving objects explained.

The four-minute animated video “Close to You” released by Nintendo yesterday has been updated to feature Pikmin where items previously seemed to be moving on their own.

Nintendo again did not share any details about the video, simply posting it to its Nintendo Today app without context.

That being said, it is currently unclear whether this is meant to be a promotion for a new Pikmin game, or some other Pikmin-related product.
